item.title: Kk add a quote by Ethan Hawke
item.description: "I take pleasure in the little things. Double cheeseburgers, those are good, the sky ten minutes before it rains,the moment your laugh turns into a cackle. And I sit here, and smoke my Camel straights, and I ride my own melt." -- Ethan Hawke

item.title: Kk add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Kk add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Kk add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kk add a quote by A.A. Milne
Kk add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Kk add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Folks are usually about as happy as they make their minds up to be." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Kk add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Kk add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Kk add a quote by Aryn Kyle
item.description: "Beginnings are so important. Just finding that right moment to introduce this character, this world, it’s everything." -- Aryn Kyle

item.title: Kk add a quote by Soseki Natsume
item.description: "In fact, there is no such thing as character, something fixed and final. The real thing is something that novelists don’t know how to write about. Or, if they tried, the end result would never be a novel. Real people are strangely difficult to make sense out of. Even a god would have his hands full trying. But maybe I’m jumping to conclusions, presuming that other people are a mess just because I’m put together in such a disorderly way. If so, I should apologize." -- Soseki Natsume

item.title: Kk add a quote by Gerald Early
item.description: "There are only three things that America will be remembered for 2000 years from now when they study this civilization: The Constitution, Jazz music, and Baseball. These are the 3 most beautiful things this culture's ever created." -- Gerald Early

item.title: Kk add a quote by P.D. James
item.description: "Charm is often despised but I can never see why. No one has it who isn't capable of genuinely liking others, at least at the actual moment of meeting and speaking. Charm is always genuine; it may be superficial but it isn't false." -- P.D. James

item.title: Kk add a quote by Lewis Grizzard
item.description: "The only way that I could figure they could improve upon Coca-Cola, one of life's most delightful elixirs, which studies prove will heal the sick and occasionally raise the dead, is to put bourbon in it." -- Lewis Grizzard

item.title: Kk add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's so hard to forget pain, but it's even harder to remember sweetness. We have no scar to show for happiness. We learn so little from peace." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Kk add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "All alone! Whether you like it or not, alone is something you'll be quite a lot!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Kk add a quote by Jimi Hendrix
item.description: "Excuse me while I kiss the sky." -- Jimi Hendrix

item.title: Kk add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "All little girls should be told they are pretty, even if they aren't." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Kk add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "You will always be fond of me. I represent to you all the sins you never had the courage to commit." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kk add a quote by Santosh Kalwar
item.description: "Wake up, Shake up, Make up and Break up; life is all about moving like ant in search of sugar not sand." -- Santosh Kalwar

item.title: Kk add a quote by Santosh Kalwar
item.description: "I am alive because I know how to love love." -- Santosh Kalwar

item.title: Kk add a quote by Santosh Kalwar
item.description: "By 20, you should be smart. By 30, you should be strong. By 40, you should be rich. By 50, you should be wise. But if you are smart, strong, rich and wise, you don't need any age limits." -- Santosh Kalwar

item.title: Kk add a quote by Santosh Kalwar
item.description: "We are addicted to our thoughts. We cannot change anything if we cannot change our thinking." -- Santosh Kalwar

item.title: Kk add a quote by Santosh Kalwar
item.description: "My words are the kisses but many of the times they don't taste so good as the touch of your lips does to mine." -- Santosh Kalwar

item.title: Kk add a quote by Santosh Kalwar
item.description: "Friends are like bras, attached near your heart for support. Foes are like panties, deported, every now and then, when they get dirty." -- Santosh Kalwar

item.title: Kk add a quote by Santosh Kalwar
item.description: "Always be like a water. Float in the times of pain or dance like waves along the wind which touches its surface." -- Santosh Kalwar
